org.judal.metadata

Class NameAlias

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.judal.metadata.NameAlias

  • public class NameAlias
extends Object
    Helper class for parsing "name.alias" or "name AS alias" strings
    Author:
    Sergio Montoro Ten

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public String getName()

        Get name part.

        Returns:
        Substring to the left of "." or "AS"

      • getAlias

        public String getAlias()

        Get alias part (if present).

        Substring to the left of "." or "AS"
        Returns:
        Substring to the right of "." or "AS". Or null if the parsed string has no alias.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:
        String "name AS alias"

      • parse

        public static NameAlias parse(String aliasedName)
                       throws javax.jdo.JDOUserException
        Split a column name and alias from a string. The input string must be of the form: "columnName" "tableName"."columnName" "tableName".columnName" "columnAlias" "tableName".columnName" AS "columnAlias" Double quotes are optional for tableName, columnName and columnAlias if they do not contain spaces
        Parameters:
        aliasedName - String
        Returns:
        NameAlias
        Throws:
        javax.jdo.JDOUserException - if given aliasedName does not match any of the recognized patterns
